text:
I configured PHP 4.2.0 as filter and added index.php to the directoryindex list.
When I now call http://www.isl.org:4080/staff/ it will display incomplete HTML
code as ASCII in the browser. Adding an index.php to the URL results in the
correct resulting HTML-Page.
This has also been reported to the www.php.net.
Please verify because I am not sure if the problem is in the php code or in
Apache.

Thanks.

Kai Hofmann

text:
This is almost certainly a problem with PHP not with Apache.  If the PHP
developers can conclusively determine that this problem is an httpd-2.0 bug,
they will beat us over the head.  =)
